DOC.brief_summary: Previous study suggest addition chemotherapy radiation therapy surgery may survival benefit patient high risk endometrial cancer . In addition , docetaxel plus cisplatin regimen may similar efficacy paclitaxel plus carboplatin currently use case . However , docetaxel plus cisplatin may cause less toxicity compare paclitaxel plus carboplatin . Therefore , investigator aim analyze efficacy docetaxel plus cisplatin regimen follow radiation therapy surgery patient high risk endometrial cancer .
DOC.brief_title: Efficacy Study Chemotherapy Followed Radiation Therapy Treat Endometrial Cancer
DOC.criteria: One follow high risk group Stage III stag operation Stage II ( Type I hysterectomy + BSO + LND ) Stage I + two [ Grade III , LVSI+ , Mm > 1/2 ] Clear cell serous carcinoma : stage IBII Age : 2075 ECOG PS : 02 Adequate organ function BM : WBC ≥ 3,000/mm3 , ANC≥1,500/mm3 , Plt≥100X103/mm3 , Hb≥10.0 g/dl Kidney : Creatinine < 1.25 × UNL이고 , GFR ≥ 60 Liver : AST , ALT < 3×UNL , T bil < 1.5 mg/ mm3 Informed Consent Previous chemotherapy pelvic RT Hormone therapy within 4 week Other malignant disease Uncontrolled medical disease Infection require antibiotic Symptomatic CHF , RF , Angina , Arrhythmia , etc . Neurosis psychosis Etc .
